message:
Log4j 1.2 Category.forcedLog was wrapping the message with an ObjectMessage even if the parameter was an ObjectMessage

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/log4j/log4j2/trunk@1395865 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

added: Message msg = message instanceof Message ? (ObjectMessage) message : new ObjectMessage(message);
deleted: logger.log(null, fqcn, lvl, new ObjectMessage(message), t);
